text: He granthadharakanno! Je kahi amhi avatarita kele ahe, je tumacyajavala asalelya (grantha) la satya asalyace sangato, tyavara yapurvi imana rakha ki amhi cehare bighadavuna takaveta ani tyanna phiravuna pathikade karave kinva tyancyavara dhihkkaraca mara karava, jasa amhi sanivaravalya lokanvara kela ahe, ani allahaca nirnaya purna jhalyasivaya rahata nahi
